channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Simple Fix for the Antisemitism Awareness Act
item.description: There is a simple way to fix the Antisemitism Awareness Act.

item.title: Middle East Crisis: Cease-Fire Talks Stall as Anger Flares Over Israel’s Incursion Into Rafah
item.description: Israeli and Hamas delegations left the negotiations in Cairo, along with the C.I.A. director, dealing a blow to hopes a deal could be reached soon.

item.title: Wall Street cheers uptick in layoffs as S&P 500 rises within 1% of its record high
item.description: The Dow gained 331.37, or 0.8%, and the Nasdaq added 43.51, or 0.3%.

item.title: Fresh Off Defeat in Speaker Fight, Greene Is ‘Thrilled’ With the Chaos She Wrought
item.description: The hard-right congresswoman from Georgia said she got exactly what she wanted when she failed to depose Speaker Mike Johnson: proof that he had been co-opted by Democrats and the G.O.P. was complicit.

item.title: Friday Briefing: Stormy Daniels, Day Two
California partners with 5 tech firms to use AI to tackle traffic jams, taxes, other issues
item.description: The companies will start a six-month internal trial where the tools are tested and evaluated by state workers, with each firm being paid $1 for their proposals.

item.title: Biden’s Warning Over Rafah Sharpens a Problem for Netanyahu
item.description: “If we need to stand alone, we will stand alone,” the Israeli prime minister said, as the U.S. threatened to withhold more weapons.

item.title: Biden’s Warning Over Rafah Sharpens a Problem for Netanyahu
item.description: “If we need to stand alone, we will stand alone,” the Israeli prime minister said, as the U.S. threatened to withhold more weapons.

item.title: Bed Bath & Beyond sues Hudson Bay, claiming hedge fund's 'funny math' swiped $300 million from now-bankrupt retailer
item.description: “When all was said and done...BBBY was bankrupt, while the Hudson Bay defendants had reaped a short-swing profit of over $300 million,” the complaint said.

item.title: Israel ‘Smashing Into Rafah’ Will Not Eradicate Hamas, Biden Aide Says
item.description: The president has grown increasingly wary of a major assault in the densely populated city in southern Gaza.

item.title: Israel ‘Smashing Into Rafah’ Will Not Eradicate Hamas, Biden Aide Says
item.description: The president has grown increasingly wary of a major assault in the densely populated city in southern Gaza.

item.title: Gen Zers only plan to have one kid—and that’s bad news for our graying nation
item.description: The number of young women who don't want more children has almost doubled over the last five years.

item.title: At a Dinner, Trump Assailed Climate Rules and Asked $1 Billion From Big Oil
item.description: At a private meeting at Mar-a-Lago, the former president said fossil fuel companies should donate to help him beat President Biden.

item.title: Gazans Flee Rafah, Seeking Safety From Israeli Attacks
item.description: Tens of thousands of people have fled Rafah, Gaza, this week since Israel escalated attacks and ordered evacuations from the eastern part of the city.

item.title: Even after cramming its video game with Walmart ads and billboards, Roblox struggles to tap into the wallets of extremely online Gen Alpha
item.description: The gaming platform this week reported its lowest growth rate in gaming time in two years.
